attributes.action: Remove VAT on sanitary towels and tampons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to government to remove VAT on sanitary products such as tampons and towels.  These products are not luxury items and VAT is not payable on bandages so why should they be payable on these.  This is a sexually discrimatory tax which penalises only one section of society.
